trans-unit.source: Provides information about input from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre a entrada de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput> to get information about the input the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> receives when the user moves the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput> para obter informações sobre a entrada de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> recebe quando o usuário move a caneta.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that checks for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down> gesture.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> que verifica a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down> gesto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> to subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> method, which is called from the application thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> chamadas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> na <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> para assinar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> método, que é chamado do thread do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the stylus points that are collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os pontos de caneta que são coletados da caneta.

trans-unit.source: The stylus points that are collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos de caneta que são coletados da caneta.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to change the stylus points in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como alterar os pontos de caneta no <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that restricts ink to a certain area, see the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> overview.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> que restringe a tinta para uma determinada área, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> visão geral.

trans-unit.source: The data to pass to the application thread.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem passados para o thread de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Subscribes to the application thread's corresponding stylus methods.
trans-unit.target: Assina os métodos de caneta correspondentes do thread do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The pen's input is routed to an element's <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: A caneta da entrada é roteada para um elemento <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> no thread de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Because accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements.
trans-unit.target: Como testes de acertos precisos não podem ser executados no thread da caneta, alguns elementos podem, ocasionalmente, receber entradas da caneta destinadas a outros elementos.

trans-unit.source: If you need to be sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> method in the method that occurs on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisa ter certeza de que a entrada foi roteada corretamente antes de executar uma operação, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> método no método que ocorre no thread de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> to subscribe to the application thread's method.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista onde você pode chamar <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> para inscrever-se ao método do segmento do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in this method
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> nesse método

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to this method
trans-unit.target: Para assinar este método

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that checks for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down> gesture.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> que verifica a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down> gesto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> to subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> method, which is called from the application thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> chamadas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> na <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> para assinar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> método, que é chamado do thread do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The stylus points to pass to the application thread.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos de caneta a serem passados para o thread de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Sets the stylus points that are passed to the application thread.
trans-unit.target: Define os pontos de caneta que são passados para o thread de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>, can get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> set by <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.SetStylusPoints%2A> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eventos como <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown> e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>, pode obter o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> definido por <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.SetStylusPoints%2A> chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to change the stylus points in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como alterar os pontos de caneta no <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that restricts ink to a certain area, see the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> overview.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> que restringe a tinta para uma determinada área, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> visão geral.

trans-unit.source: for setting the stylus points.
trans-unit.target: Para definir os pontos de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the current stylus device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador do dispositivo de caneta atual.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example ensures that the stylus points collected are from the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir garante que os pontos de caneta coletados são da mesma <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice>.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of the bigger example in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte do exemplo maior no <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the current tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador do dispositivo de tablet atual.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time at which the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a hora em que o processo foi iniciado.

trans-unit.source: The time at which the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: A hora em que ocorreu a entrada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.Timestamp%2A> property is the value of the <xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property at which the stylus event occurred.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.Timestamp%2A> propriedade é o valor da <xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade na qual ocorreu o evento de caneta.
